White now has an issue where is the light square bishop to go? Bb5 a6 Bxc6 only makes blacks center stronger.  Bd3 is silly and can be laughed at. As white really needs to play d4 soon.  d4 d5! exd5 exd5 Bd3?! (Be2 is now forced and black still has gained a lot of space) cxd4 looks good for black.  Be2 only serves to block the soon opening e-file. Wouldn't it be great if the Bishop could come to f1 and the Rook be on the open e-file after d4?  What is this you say it can lets see.
